channel.title: Shit I'm Not Proud Of
channel.description: A show about relationships, self-compassion, and the absurd things that life sometimes throws at us. Whether on a bad date, or years into a relationship, sometimes the story unfolds and we can't help but look back and laugh at ourselves. We attempt to explore and make peace with those things.
channel.itunes:author: Charley and Anna
channel.itunes:summary: A show about relationships, self-compassion, and the absurd things that life sometimes throws at us. Whether on a bad date, or years into a relationship, sometimes the story unfolds and we can't help but look back and laugh at ourselves. We attempt to explore and make peace with those things.

item.title: Episode 9: Kill Your Heroes w/ Maggie , Mike, Phil, and Henry
item.description:
Have you ever asked yourself how your personality blends with your own unique experiences, and the influence of your parents? In this special holiday recording, we invite a gaggle of giggling family members to explore the developmental milestone of realizing that our parents are mere mortals, keeping up with expectations (14:40), the value of tradition (32:20), and spill the beans on some well-kept secrets (49:15). 

References: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bh_X8wsf1Io

Music: 

Artist: Nicolai Heidlas 

Title: On And On 

http://www.hooksounds.com

Artist: Benjamin Tissot 

Title: Jazz Comedy 

https://www.bensound.com/

item.title: Episode 8: Snubbed! w/ Maggie
item.description:
Ringing in the New Year with Anna and special guest Maggie, we dissect the delicate art of relationship annihilation, lessons learned in the year past, and practicing self-care habits during times of personal peace. 

Music 

Artist: Benjamin Tissot 

Title: The Jazz Piano 

https://www.bensound.com/
item.itunes:summary:
Ringing in the New Year with Anna and special guest Maggie, we dissect the delicate art of relationship annihilation, lessons learned in the year past, and practicing self-care habits during times of personal peace. 

Music 

Artist: Benjamin Tissot 

Title: The Jazz Piano 

https://www.bensound.com/

item.title: Episode 7: Upside Down w/ Jen
item.description:
Today, we take some time to explore what life is like when things get a little bit out of balance. To assist us in the journey, special guest Jen joins and teaches us about the hidden world of acrobatics. We explore the work required to find balance (15:07), the ongoing quest to understand personal fluidity (19:00), the value of teaching consent in a community (33:15), and how to embrace vulnerability in times of discomfort (38:45). 

Links 

http://flightclubdenver.com

http://www.denveracroyoga.com

Music 

Artist: Freewheel Trio 

https://freewheeltrio.bandcamp.com

item.title: Episode 6: Life After Marriage w/ Sharon
item.description:
Charley and Anna meet with local blogger Sharon, author of The Relationship Rolodex, to discuss the mechanics of sustaining a thriving relationship, lessons we have learned from others (21:16), the pragmatism of holding space (26:40), and the importance of growth and change with a partner (38:00).
Links https://relationshiprolodex.wordpress.com
Music Artist: Freewheel Trio https://freewheeltrio.bandcamp.com
Off-Topic References https://i.imgur.com/K48xAs4.jpg https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IeZMIgheZro

item.title: Episode 5: Express Yourself
item.description:
Dragging their heels after the first round of holiday ballast, Anna and Charley trot down to the studio and talk about the drunk alter-ego, online dating, self-expression, and being stuck in life transitions.
Music Artist: Jeff Kaale Title: Mai Tai http://www.hooksounds.com
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Episode 4: Emotional Plasticity w/ Alyssa
item.description:
Charley, Anna, and Alyssa explore how our past experiences can shape our present and future.
Music Artist: Benjamin Tissot Title: All That https://www.bensound.com/
item.itunes:summary:
Charley, Anna, and Alyssa explore how our past experiences can shape our present and future.
Music Artist: Benjamin Tissot Title: All That https://www.bensound.com/

item.title: Episode 3: A Scary Time in America w/ Jarrod
item.description:
Following a sound byte from a few news cycles ago, Anna and Charley bring on Jarrod to dissect and discuss the hidden truths to an otherwise controversial statement.
Music: Artist: Benjamin Tissot Title: Hip Jazz https://www.bensound.com/
Artist: Lynzy Lab Title: A Scary Time https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzYcyk5XUUplIgHSm0j-BUA

item.title: Episode 2: Limerance, or Unrequited Love
item.description:
For many of us, managing unrequited love can feel like trying to disarm a bomb.
Music: Artist: Nicolai Heidlas Title: Some Ways http://www.hooksounds.com Artist: Alvaro Angeloro Title: I Believe In You http://www.hooksounds.com

item.title: Episode 1: Why Are We Here?
item.description:
The very first episode of our new project. We’re very excited to be publishing this show, and positively have no idea what we are doing. Meet your handsome and talented hosts, Charley and Anna. 

Music:
Artist: Gunnar Olsen
Title: Pisco Sour
https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/music
